title: Microsoft Teams Onboarding for Remote Tech Employees
description: A practical course designed to help remote tech employees become comfortable and confident in using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
goal: Develop an accessible onboarding course that equips remote tech employees with essential skills in Microsoft Teams for effective daily communication, collaboration, and productivity without feeling overwhelmed.
audience: Tech professionals working remotely who need to use Microsoft Teams daily.

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to the platform and its features

sections.title: Navigating the Interface
sections.description: Exploring the layout and basic navigation

sections.title: Chat Features
sections.description: Using chat for quick messages and discussions

sections.title: Video Calls
sections.description: Scheduling, participating in, and managing video calls

sections.title: Creating and Managing Channels
sections.description: Setting up channels for different projects or topics

sections.title: Working on Projects Together
sections.description: Using Teams to collaborate effectively with team members

sections.title: File Sharing and Storage
sections.description: Uploading, downloading, and managing files within Teams

sections.title: Utilizing Additional Tools
sections.description: Exploring other productivity-enhancing features in Teams
